snippet: Russia’s most powerful law enforcement agency has opened a criminal case against the bass guitarist of Bloodhound Gang, who is accused of “inciting hatred” during a show.
abstract: Investigative Committee, Russia's most powerful law enforcement organization, has opened a criminal case against Jared Hasselhoff, bass guitarist of the American rock group Bloodhound Gang, for 'inciting hatred' during a show; Hasselhoff passed a wadded-up Russian flag through the crotch of his pants during a show in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s most powerful law enforcement agency has opened a criminal case against the bass guitarist of Bloodhound Gang, who is accused of “inciting hatred” during a show.

headline.main: Russia: Inquiry Focuses on Antics of U.S. Rock Band With Russian Flag
headline.print_headline: Russia: Inquiry Into Onstage Antics Of Rock Band With Russian Flag
